summary: hot take the new got trailer doesn’t give much away and i don’t think it means they’re gonna die this season.... i think it...
body: hot take the new got trailer doesn’t give much away and i don’t think it means they’re gonna die this season…. i think it represents that they have all returned to their roots (the crypt, under winterfell, yadda yadda), are going to stick together (all of the statues are in the same alcove–the other statues in the crypt stand more individually), and are all going to fight, together, for winterfell, for house stark, and for the north (again, they are all together, and all in the crypt at winterfell, indicating that they were all loyal to the north/house stark/winterfell before they “died”. also, i imagine a sculptor might not be so kind to a face/figure that the people weren’t a fan of, especially in times of such turmoil, but that’s not a hot take that’s a burn ur mouth cuz u took it out and ate it immediately take). no hate, but to me, it’s pretty solid proof that jon is in it for the north and won’t end up with dany, bc if he did, she would either be in the crypt with him or he would be in a crypt with her wherever she was “buried”.

Hi guys, just letting all you wonderful people know that I do requests for a lot of fandoms such as Game of thrones, The 100, American horror story coven and apocalypse, marvel, Harry Potter, the hunger games, Throne of glass and maze runner. If there’s something that you really want written but the fandom isn’t on the list don’t be shy, send me an ask if I do that fandom and I’ll let you know.

tags: a song of ice and fire
summary:
Well I need to get this out of my chest and share it with everyone who might "see" it as well.
I wanna talk about the crypts.It...
body:
Is “House Stark” literary coming back to life?

Well I need to get this out of my chest and share it with everyone who might “see” it as well.

I wanna talk about the crypts.It seems to me from that chilling scene where Sansa,Jon and Arya are facing their statues that House Stark statues are going to play a huge role to the last season of Game of Thrones.

Let me show you what I mean :

Why then show an Arya statue? I mean ,if the whole purpose is to fright the audience by implying that 3 of them remaining Starks are going to perish ,then I get it.But that’s not the case I believe.

I truly believe the message is entirely different.I think it notifies that Arya,Sansa and Jon are going to stand their ground and protect their home from the upcoming threat just like their ancestors did.

Moreover:

What does it mean “is partly collapsed”? Is this the way the Night’s King will make his appearance?Does he already know this considering his Stark roots?That there is a “weakness” deeper into the castle’s defences that he can take advantage of?

Also I want to add these two things I found considering Jon’s opinion about the crypts:

Jon is afraid of the crypts because he feels something is waiting for him. That “wall” that keeps him from his father and brother really creeps me out.What can it mean? Because beyond [ The Wall ] we’ve seen dead people coming back to life,with no flesh just bones.And now that the Wall has fallen who knows what can happen? I know I may read things too deep but, is there a possibility of all the perished Starks coming back to life to defend Winterfell and aid to the battle between the living and the dead?

Plus we already know that a gathering of the whole cast happened for a special epeisode or so they say.

Wouldn’t it be glorious Robb,Ned,Lyanna,Catelyn,Rickon,House Stark members of the past and the direwolves coming alive for one last time to defend their family?

blog.name: jonsa101
blog.title: Jonsa101
blog.description: #Jonsa and #Sharpwin Meta Writer. Pop Culture Obsessed. Lover of Street Style.

summary:
But why on earth would the show have Sansa looking like this:
Where everyone and their mama take notice and can’t stop talking...
body:
I’m Sorry I Still Can’t Wrap My Mind Around This and I Promise I’m Not Trying To Be Petty

But why on earth would the show have Sansa looking like this:

Where everyone and their mama take notice and can’t stop talking about how beautiful Sansa looks and then have Dany looking like this:

With an outfit everyone knows is ill fitted and makes Daenerys look frumpy! To add insult to injury they made her wear a damn ascot! Instead of looking like Jon’s lover her ass is actually looking like his aunt!

If Dany is supposed to be the YMBQ and victorious in her quest for the Iron Throne, why on earth would the show literally give her the worst outfit she’s ever had on this show in the season that matters the most! Throughout the series Daenerys has probably had some of the best outfits on the show. They flattered her and made her look incredibly beautiful. But this outfit is a complete mess and if anything, Dany’s outfit is supposed to fucking slay this season!!

It doesn’t make sense! Unless…..

There is a narrative purpose for this. Maybe just maybe Dany’s outfit reflects the type of season she’s going to have. The same goes with Sansa. Maybe the reason why Sansa looks beautiful, confident and sexy all at the same time is because Sansa is about to glow up and truly blossom into her own and who she’s supposed to be in season 8.

My last point is this. Is it by accident that they’re making Sansa look exceptionally beautiful while Jon’s around?! I don’t think so. We’ve had two clips now where Jon can’t seem to take his eyes off of his sister/cousin even while Dany is right next to him. So yeah…. I’m just gonna leave it at that.

*Also this is in no way comparing how beautiful Sophie Turner and Emilia Clarke are! They are both stunners! I’m simply making an observation pertaining to the characters and the outfit/look choices the show runners purposely chose for them this season!

description:
Other people start to notice the changes in their behavior.
